sentence.Network_en: The empire had for years been falling into decadence.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个帝国走向腐朽堕落已经经年。

sentence.Network_en: The country, they say, will inevitably now plunge headlong into decadence.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们说，现在整个国家会不可避免地一头陷入衰退中。

sentence.Network_en: the decadence of modern Western society
sentence.Network_cn: 现代西方社会的颓废现象

PerfectNetExp.abs: 对颓废(decadence)的理解，西方权威的《牛津文学术语词典》是这样解释的：“在19世纪之前出现于文学作品中的一种低俗文学品质 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from French décadence, from medieval Latin decadentia; related to decay

entry.def: If you say that a person or society is decadent, you think that they have low moral standards and are interested mainly in pleasure.

example.ex: ...restrictions on the number of decadent western films that were allowed to be shown.
example.tran: 对颓靡的西方电影在上映数量上的限制

example.ex: ...the excesses and stresses of their decadent rock 'n' roll lifestyles.
example.tran: 他们颓废的摇滚生活的种种放浪及层层重压

means.word_mean: 1. the state of being degenerate in mental or moral qualities

auth_sentence.content: Some pathetic exclamation on the decadence of taste and genius.
auth_sentence.res_content: Some pathetic exclamation on the decadence of taste and genius.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Some pathetic exclamation on the decadence of taste and genius.

auth_sentence.content: Decadence, decay, decline, dull inefficiency, and apocalypse .
auth_sentence.res_content: Decadence, decay, decline, dull inefficiency, and apocalypse .
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Decadence, decay, decline, dull inefficiency, and apocalypse .

auth_sentence.content: I have no profession...It is another example of my decadence.
auth_sentence.res_content: I have no profession...It is another example of my decadence.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I have no profession...It is another example of my decadence.

means.word_mean: （道德或艺术上的）衰落, 堕落, 颓废

sentences.en: The decadence of morals is bad for a nation.
sentences.cn: 道德的堕落对国家是不利的。
